MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW5 postcode area of Nantwich. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.47AM. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.42AM on 1st March 2021.
